content:
Announcing SUSHI 0.13.2

SUSHI 0.13.2 is a minor patch release on the major 0.13.x release. Users upgrading directly to 0.13.2 should still read the SUSHI 0.13.0 release notes. SUSHI 0.13.2 contains the following fix:

  • Correctly sets FSHOnly flag when migrating from an existing project with no ig-data folder

Full release notes: https://github.com/FHIR/sushi/releases/tag/v0.13.2
